articles.title: Pope to include Latter-day Saints in interfaith meeting during groundbreaking visit to Mongolia - Salt Lake Tribune
articles.description: Pope Francis is traveling to Mongolia this week to minister to one of the world's tiniest and newest Catholic communities, the first-ever visit by a Roman pontiff to the East Asian country.
articles.content: Vatican City When Pope Francis travels to Mongolia this week, he will in some ways be completing a mission begun by the 13th-century Pope Innocent IV, who dispatched emissaries east to ascertain the … [+7602 chars]

articles.title: India vs Pakistan, Asia Cup 2023: "No Matter How Much IPL You Play...": Ex-Pakistan Star's Veiled Di.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India and Pakistan are scheduled to face each other on September 02 in the Asia Cup 2023.
